ai-atk-s0303a5:1_1: Abandoning the mind is a corruption of the defilements,
ai-atk-s0303a5:1_2: if he is the Four Great Sages,
ai-atk-s0303a5:1_3: How is there a corruption of the mind’s corruptions?
ai-atk-s0303a5:1_4: those who have lost their way,
ai-atk-s0303a5:1_5: for that wise person will be known
ai-atk-s0303a5:1_6: Failing to renunciation, he recalling the nine worlds,
ai-atk-s0303a5:1_8: Since he does so, he should examine the very things that are capable of realizing anything that can be realized by insight, and he should instruct those who know about the six truths. He should inform them: “Conquerorship with respect to renunciation.” He must be distinguished by those who know the teachings.
ai-atk-s0303a5:2_0: The Linked Discourses on the defilements is finished.
